entry.title: Installing Scribus svn in Debian Squeeze
entry.summary: I heard that Unicode rending issues of complex scripts are fixed in svn version of Scribus(1.5). So I wanted to test it for Kannada.

entry.title: Slackware mania
entry.summary: Yes!... I decided to install Slackware Gnu/Linux in my Laptop. Currently I have Debian Lenny installed in it. I don't know i will have dual boot with Lenny or complete install. If I have only Slack then I feel I will learn more, since their will be no chance left to switch the OS if any problems occur. :)

entry.title: Kannada Reading and Writing support in Debian Lenny
entry.summary: Now it is very easy to enable and configure Kannada in Debian. Install the following packages using apt-get or synaptic package manager.
